segments.text: I see the boy on the stool, reaching for the cookie jar, and it makes me feel a bit disgusted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He is being quite reckless, risking a fall just for some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl standing next to him seems to be encouraging his behavior, which is not right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they are both being quite naughty, trying to get cookies without the woman noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks quite unstable, and it's disgusting to see them being so careless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe they are willing to risk an accident just for some treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is making me feel quite uncomfortable, seeing them behave like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they have any idea how dangerous their actions are.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get hurt, but I also hope they learn a lesson from this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The artist did a great job capturing the recklessness of childhood in this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy's actions are a metaphor for the recklessness of youth.
segments.speaker: PAR
